name: Color Switcher (Marlin Media)
description:
Use LEFT <- and RIGHT -> keyboard arrows to rotate the color triangle. Match the colors on the triangle to the color of the falling ring.

This game was created as a tutorial series of videos on my YouTube channel. It's made in Construct 3 and can be made by anyone who wants to use C3 to make games! All you have to do to get started is watch my detailed tutorial videos https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi1pYAxtZVT07HijYND8Dpg? This version of the game features a scoring system, high score counter and a level up system that makes the game move faster as you progress. Have fun! Thanks for playing!!
